response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. We are offering this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000, which represents a substantial discount compared to its market value. We are confident that this offer will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you decide to proceed, please let us know, and we will arrange for immediate delivery. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 1200000}
